sentences.en: Also, used for carving and decorative grinding gems, glass, ceramics, stone, etc.
sentences.cn: 同时, 也用于宝石 、 玻璃 、 陶瓷 、 石材的雕琢和磨花.

sentences.en: an exhibition of ceramics by Picasso
Ceramics primarily have ionic bonds, but covalent bonding is also present.
sentences.cn: 陶瓷初始状态是受离子束缚的, 但是还是有共价键结构的.

sentences.en: Commonly used bearing material has SiC ceramics, graphite, PTFE, such as filling.
sentences.cn: 常用的轴承材料有碳化硅陶瓷 、 石墨 、 填充聚四氟乙烯等.

sentences.en: Development of the ferroelectric ceramics in recent years has led to superior detection ability.
sentences.cn: 近代所发明的铁电陶瓷具有优良的检测能力.

sentences.en: Our company has been engaged in ceramics for over 20 years.
sentences.cn: 我们公司曾经从事陶瓷工业有20多年了.

sentences.en: The alumina ceramics is of good properties and widely used.
sentences.cn: 氧化铝陶瓷具有良好的性能,故应用广泛.

sentences.en: The ceramics bore the imprint of Luca della Robbia.
sentences.cn: 陶器上印有卢卡·德拉·罗比亚的字样.

sentences.en: The main classes of materials are metals, polymers, ceramics, and composites.
sentences.cn: 材料的主要分类为金属 、 高聚物, 陶瓷, 及合成材料.

sentences.en: The popular ceramics industry expanded towards the middle of the 19th century.
sentences.cn: 到19世纪中期，大众制陶业得到了发展。

sentences.en: There is significant value for the phase transformation characteristics of antiferroelectric ceramics.
sentences.cn: 反铁电陶瓷在外场诱导下的相变特性具有重要应用价值.

sentences.en: Township enterprises product, coal, iron ore, gypsum, coke, and ceramics.
sentences.cn: 乡镇企业产品有煤 、 铁矿石 、 石膏 、 焦炭和陶瓷制品.

sentences.en: Uses: For manufacture of ceramics , porcelain, enamel and detergent material.
sentences.cn: 用途: 供制陶瓷 、 搪瓷、清洁剂等.

sentences.en: Welcome domestic and international ceramics and pottery lovers to exchange and cooperation!
sentences.cn: 欢迎国内外陶瓷商和陶瓷爱好者前来交流合作!
